data.name: Order Road
data.detailed_description:
Order Road is a kinematic visual novel with optional mini-games.
Nikolay Porridge prepares for Computer Science exam. Only his friends can save him. Watch him as he experience unspeakable ordeals of education and gets distracted by action games.

Features
  • Kinematic visual novel
  • Multiple action game modes and cross-linked stories to the plot
  • Animated 3D characters
  • Over 25 optional action stages in mini-games which distract from reading the novel
  • Animated physical text that reacts to cursor movement
  • Dark Russian underground atmosphere
  • Crude humor
  • Cringe

data.short_description: Porridge Nikolay and his friends are preparing for final Computer Science exam. What could go wrong?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 320m
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5500
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 320m
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5500
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Most of in-game interaction end in violence, blood and gore. Plot got mentions drug and alcohol consumption.
